mapper.select: SELECT c.member_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM schedule s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.category_id WHERE s.completion_status = 0 AND DATE(s.schedule_deadline) = CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY c.member_id

SELECT c.member_id, COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN s.completion_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completed FROM schedule s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.category_id WHERE s.schedule_deadline BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURRENT_DATE) DAY) AND DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL (6 - WEEKDAY(CURRENT_DATE)) DAY) GROUP BY c.member_id
